name: mcp-sqlite-readonly
description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that provides read-only SQLite database interaction capabilities with enterprise-grade security
author: Fanom2813

scripts.clean: npx rimraf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.install: npm rebuild sqlite3 --build-from-source || echo 'Warning: sqlite3 build failed. Trying prebuilt binaries...'
scripts.postinstall: node -e "console.log('\nMCP SQLite server installed! Run with: npx mcp-sqlite-server <database-path>')"
